item.title: Home Lab Part 3: Building the first version of my home lab
item.description: After the prelude of the previous posts, now its time to share the experiences I had while building my home lab that had three iterations. I set a group of criteria during the planing of the build of the equipment I wanted to use in the first iteration of my home lab. The main ones are: RAM Capacity: Because the primary use case is to run virtual machines, the number of virtual machines depends directly on the amount of RAM.
